title: Lunar Revel Shop?
body: Is this actually a shop? Like the snowdown shop?

replies.body: ohh sorry that was the end date lol

> [{quoted}](name=TS9WaTerFox,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HldkiTwU,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-28T12:28:26.726+0000)
>
> When this shop will come ?

Sephyre [covers this here, ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/30YZgAVX-lunar-revel-shop-and-skin-discounts?comment=0002) but the long and the short of it is during January 29th.
